docs.text:
Crate

  

    Popup Discord widgets for your website.
  






    

        

            Demo
        
 |
        

            Trello
    
 |
        

            Discord
        

    

    

  

        

    

    

        

    








What is it?
¶


Crate is a JS library that allows you to place Discord buttons on your website. It features




Real-time messages toasts on your website


Unread message indicator


Highly configurable options


Extensive API
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: Crate is a JS library that allows you to place Discord buttons on your website. It features   Real-time messages toasts on your website  Unread message indicator  Highly configurable options  Extensive API
docs.title: What is it?

docs.text:
Options
¶


Typescript typings
/**


 * WidgetBot widget options


 */


server
: 
string
                
// Your guilds ID


channel
: 
string
               
// Channel ID


options?
: 
string
              
// WidgetBot widget options


beta?
: 
boolean
                
// Whether to use the beta domain or not


buttons
?:
 
{
                   
// Change text of buttons

  
primary?
: 
string

  
secondar?
: 
string


}


username
: 
string
              
// Use a specific username for the guest chatter



/**


 * Aesthetic options


 */


logo?
: 
Url
 
|
 
'intercom'
 
|
 
'discord'
 
|
 
any
 
|
 
{

  
url
: 
Url

  
size?
: 
string


}


scheme
?:
 
'dark'
 
|
 
'light'
     
// Whether to show dark or light toasts


style
?:
 
'material'
 
|
 
'default'
// Toggle button style


colors
?:
 
{

  
toggle?
: 
string
             
// Crate toggle button color

  
background?
: 
string
         
// WidgetBot widget background

  
button?
: 
string
             
// WidgetBot `Start chatting` button color


}


position
:
 
{

  
x
:
 
'left'
 
|
 
'right'

  
y
:
 
'top'
 
|
 
'bottom'


}


contained
: 
boolean
            
// Display modals in iframe or in the window



/**


 * Notifications


 */


notifications
?:
 
{

  
indicator
?:
 
{

    
enable
: 
boolean

  
}

  
toasts
?:
 
{

    
enable
: 
boolean
           
// Whether to enable toasts or not

    
visibilityTime?
: 
number
   
// Max amount of time the toasts should be visible for (set to 0 to disable timeout)

    
maxMessages?
: 
number
      
// Max amount of messages to display on screen

    
maxHeight?
: 
string
        
// Max height of the toast container, CSS `calc()` can be used

  
}


}



/**


 * General options


 */


delay?
: 
boolean
               
// Only load the widget once the button has been clicked
docs.title: Options
Options

docs.text:
API
¶


Once you've initialised a new constructor, you can manipulate it using the following methods


toggle
(
open
?:
 
boolean
)
¶


Toggles the message view, with an optional param to set it.




Usage


// Toggle


crate
.
toggle
()



// Toggle open


crate
.
toggle
(
true
)



// Toggle closed


crate
.
toggle
(
false
)









show
()
¶


Shows the message view. Alias for 
toggle(false)




Usage


// Toggle open


crate
.
show
()









hide
()
¶


Hides the message view. Alias for 
toggle(false)




Usage


// Toggle open


crate
.
show
()









attach
()
¶


Un-hides the entire widget by re-attaching the React component from the DOM.




Usage


// Button will now appear


crate
.
attach
()









detach
()
¶


Hides the entire widget by detaching the React component from the DOM.




Usage


// Button will now disappear


crate
.
detach
()









remove
()
¶


Permanently removes the entire widget by detaching the React component from the DOM.




Usage


// Button will disappear


crate
.
remove
()
docs.title: API

docs.text: Once you've initialised a new constructor, you can manipulate it using the following methods
docs.title: API

docs.text: Toggles the message view, with an optional param to set it.   Usage  // Toggle  crate . toggle ()  // Toggle open  crate . toggle ( true )  // Toggle closed  crate . toggle ( false )
docs.title: toggle(open?: boolean)

docs.text: Shows the message view. Alias for  toggle(false)   Usage  // Toggle open  crate . show ()
docs.title: show()

docs.text: Hides the message view. Alias for  toggle(false)   Usage  // Toggle open  crate . show ()
docs.title: hide()

docs.text: Un-hides the entire widget by re-attaching the React component from the DOM.   Usage  // Button will now appear  crate . attach ()
docs.title: attach()

docs.text: Hides the entire widget by detaching the React component from the DOM.   Usage  // Button will now disappear  crate . detach ()
docs.title: detach()

docs.text: Permanently removes the entire widget by detaching the React component from the DOM.   Usage  // Button will disappear  crate . remove ()
docs.title: remove()

Sync
¶


We recommend using the 
async
 version of the API, as it'll make your website 
way faster
. The synchronous version should only be used if it's being dynamically inserted into your website after the page's initial load (eg. A custom JS script)


Initialising a custom crate object
¶


See the Pen 
ppGqYJ
 by Sam Denty (
@samdenty99
) on 
CodePen
.
